subject: Ethics
title: The Savior Siblings Debate
description: A fast breakdown of The Savior Siblings Debate for builders.

hook.text: Your daughter is dying. You conceive another child specifically to be her bone marrow donor.

buildup.text: Savior siblings are children conceived through IVF and selected to be tissue-matched donors.

discovery.text: The Hashmi family in the UK fought a legal battle to create a sibling who could save their sick son.

twist.text: Critics ask: is the second child valued for who they are, or only for what they can provide?
